title: WATCH: Did Cameron Jerome dive in Derby's match vs Bristol City?
description: Cameron Jerome was booked for diving in the Bristol City penalty area, but should the Derby striker have been awarded a penalty instead?
content: The striker - who joined from Norwich in a Â£1.5m deal earlier this week - was introduced for the first time as a second-half substitute at Pride Park.His performance had not caught the eye up until the 87th minute when he chased a ball inside the area and went down under the challenge of Bristol City defender Aden Flint.Referee Darren England booked Jerome for diving, but replays suggested there was contact between the former Norwich striker and Flint.
